parameter.name: AppPath
parameter.description: Full site path where you want to install Ghost.

parameter.name: Url
parameter.description: The URL where Ghost will be hosted.

parameter.name: Transport
parameter.description: The email transport that Ghost should use. (I.e. SMTP)

parameter.name: ServiceName
parameter.description: The name of the email service that Ghost should use. (I.e. Gmail, Mailgun, Sendgrid)

parameter.name: ServiceUser
parameter.description: The user of the email service.

parameter.name: ServicePassword
parameter.description: The password for the user of the email service.
